import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Stack from 'react-bootstrap/Stack' const ProductsModal = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <>
Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ) } export default ProductsModal
